persona_en: A software developer who is looking for a way to simplify the integration of GPRS technology into their embedded system designs. They are interested in developing a stable and efficient software stack for an embedded system and are willing to invest time and effort into finding a solution that meets their requirements. They are looking for a product that is easy to use and has minimal requirements for technical knowledge, while also being able to provide accurate and reliable data transmission. They are also interested in finding a product that is compatible with other network protocols and can be easily integrated into existing systems.
persona_kr: 임베디드 시스템 설계에 GPRS 기술 통합을 간소화할 방법을 모색하는 소프트웨어 개발자입니다. 임베디드 시스템을 위한 안정적이고 효율적인 소프트웨어 스택 개발에 관심을 가지고 있으며, 요구 사항을 충족하는 솔루션을 찾는 데 시간과 노력을 투자할 의향이 있습니다. 사용하기 쉽고 기술적 지식에 대한 요구 사항이 최소화되면서도 정확하고 신뢰할 수 있는 데이터 전송을 제공할 수 있는 제품을 찾고 있습니다. 또한 다른 네트워크 프로토콜과 호환되고 기존 시스템에 쉽게 통합될 수 있는 제품을 찾는 데에도 관심이 있습니다.

backtranslation.backtranslated_en: A software developer seeking ways to simplify GPRS technology integration into embedded system design. They are interested in developing a stable and efficient software stack for embedded systems and willing to invest time and effort in finding a solution that meets their requirements. They are looking for a product that is easy to use, minimizes the need for technical expertise, and provides accurate and reliable data transmission. They are also interested in finding a product that is compatible with other network protocols and can be easily integrated into existing systems.

persona_en: A computer enthusiast who is interested in optimizing the performance of their system, particularly the CPU, GPU, and RAM. They are looking for software tools that can help them monitor and control the performance of their system, and they are willing to invest time in learning how to use these tools effectively. They are not necessarily looking for a professional-grade software tool, but rather a user-friendly and easy-to-use software that can provide comprehensive information about their system's performance and help them optimize it. They are also interested in software tools that can help them monitor the stability of their system after overclocking, as they want to avoid damaging their system.
persona_kr: 자신의 시스템, 특히 CPU, GPU, RAM의 성능 최적화에 관심이 많은 컴퓨터 애호가입니다. 시스템 성능을 모니터링하고 제어하는 데 도움이 되는 소프트웨어 도구를 찾고 있으며, 이러한 도구를 효과적으로 사용하는 방법을 배우는 데 시간을 투자할 의향이 있습니다. 반드시 전문가 수준의 소프트웨어 도구를 찾는 것은 아니지만, 시스템 성능에 대한 포괄적인 정보를 제공하고 최적화하는 데 도움이 되는 사용자 친화적이고 사용하기 쉬운 소프트웨어를 선호합니다. 또한 오버클러킹 후 시스템의 안정성을 모니터링하여 시스템 손상을 방지하는 데 도움이 되는 소프트웨어 도구에도 관심이 있습니다.

backtranslation.backtranslated_en: A computer enthusiast highly interested in optimizing the performance of their system, particularly the CPU, GPU, and RAM. They are looking for software tools to help monitor and control system performance and are willing to invest time in learning how to use these tools effectively. While not necessarily seeking professional-grade software, they prefer user-friendly and easy-to-use software that provides comprehensive information about system performance and helps with optimization. They are also interested in software tools that can help monitor system stability after overclocking to prevent system damage.

persona_en: A technology enthusiast who is fascinated by the potential of artificial intelligence and robotics to improve our lives. They are intrigued by the challenges of building robots that can understand and interact with the complex environment of the home, and are eager to see how these technologies will shape our future. They are also interested in the social and emotional aspects of robots, such as their ability to read human emotions and improve their performance over time.
persona_kr: 인공지능 및 로봇 기술이 인간의 삶을 향상시킬 수 있는 잠재력에 매료된 기술 애호가입니다. 복잡한 가정 환경을 이해하고 상호작용할 수 있는 로봇을 구축하는 데 따르는 어려움에 깊은 관심을 가지고 있으며, 이러한 기술이 미래를 어떻게 형성해 나갈지 열정적으로 지켜보고 있습니다. 또한, 인간의 감정을 읽고 시간이 지남에 따라 성능을 향상시키는 로봇의 능력과 같은 사회적, 정서적 측면에도 지대한 관심을 보입니다.

backtranslation.backtranslated_en: A tech enthusiast fascinated by the potential of AI and robotics to improve human lives. Deeply interested in the challenges of building robots that can understand and interact with complex home environments, and passionate about observing how these technologies will shape the future. Also keenly interested in the social and emotional aspects, such as a robot's ability to read human emotions and improve its performance over time.
backtranslation.divergence_explanation: The descriptions are semantically equivalent. The back-translation maintains the original's meaning, with only minor stylistic variations that do not alter the core professional identity, expertise, or perspective.

persona_en: A technical user who is familiar with the basic operations of operating systems and shell scripting, particularly in the context of sending signals to processes. This person is likely to be a system administrator or a developer who needs to manage and control processes on a Unix-based system. They are also likely to be familiar with the use of shell commands and the ability to troubleshoot and resolve issues related to process management.
persona_kr: 운영체제 기본 동작 및 셸 스크립팅, 특히 프로세스에 시그널을 전송하는 맥락에 익숙한 기술 사용자입니다. 이 사용자는 시스템 관리자이거나 유닉스 기반 시스템에서 프로세스를 관리하고 제어해야 하는 개발자일 가능성이 높습니다. 또한 셸 명령어 사용에 능숙하며 프로세스 관리와 관련된 문제를 해결하고 수정할 수 있는 능력을 갖추고 있을 것으로 예상됩니다.

backtranslation.backtranslated_en: A technically proficient user familiar with basic operating system operations and shell scripting, particularly in the context of sending signals to processes. This user is likely a system administrator or a developer who needs to manage and control processes on Unix-based systems. They are also expected to be proficient in using shell commands and capable of troubleshooting and resolving issues related to process management.
backtranslation.divergence_explanation: The two descriptions are highly similar, with only minor differences in wording that do not affect the overall meaning or professional identity. For example, "likely to be familiar with the use of shell commands and the ability to troubleshoot" vs. "expected to be proficient in using shell commands and capable of troubleshooting".

persona_en: A window manager expert who specializes in understanding and implementing the various algorithms and techniques used to position and manage windows on a computer screen. They are familiar with the different gravity settings and how they affect the placement of a window's reference point, as well as the specific coordinates for the window's top-left corner and bottom-right corner. They are skilled in using the default gravity settings to position a window at the top left corner of the screen and can adjust gravity settings to position a window at the bottom right corner of the screen. They are also familiar with the concept of subgroups and isomorphisms in group theory, which they use to understand and manipulate window positions.
persona_kr: 컴퓨터 화면 상에서 창의 위치를 지정하고 관리하는 데 사용되는 다양한 알고리즘 및 기술을 이해하고 구현하는 데 특화된 창 관리자 전문가입니다. 이들은 다양한 중력 설정과 이것이 창의 기준점 위치에 미치는 영향, 그리고 창의 좌상단 및 우하단 모서리의 특정 좌표에 대해 숙지하고 있습니다. 기본 중력 설정을 사용하여 창을 화면의 좌상단 모서리에 배치하는 데 능숙하며, 중력 설정을 조정하여 창을 화면의 우하단 모서리에 배치할 수 있습니다. 또한, 군론에서의 부분군 및 동형사상의 개념에 정통하며, 이를 활용하여 창 위치를 이해하고 조작합니다.

backtranslation.backtranslated_en: A window manager expert specializing in understanding and implementing various algorithms and technologies used to specify and manage window positions on a computer screen. They are knowledgeable about different gravity settings and their impact on a window's anchor point location, as well as the specific coordinates of a window's top-left and bottom-right corners. They are proficient in using default gravity settings to place windows in the top-left corner of the screen and can adjust gravity settings to position windows in the bottom-right corner. Furthermore, they are well-versed in the concepts of subgroups and isomorphisms in group theory and leverage this knowledge to understand and manipulate window positions.

persona_en: A technology enthusiast and a curious mind who is interested in the cutting-edge technologies, particularly quantum computing. They are intrigued by the potential of quantum computing to revolutionize computing and data processing, and are eager to learn more about the technology and its applications. They are also interested in the ethical and social implications of quantum computing and its potential impact on society.
persona_kr: 최첨단 기술, 특히 양자 컴퓨팅에 대한 높은 관심을 가진 기술 애호가이자 호기심 많은 연구자입니다. 양자 컴퓨팅이 컴퓨팅 및 데이터 처리 분야에 가져올 혁신적인 잠재력에 매료되어, 해당 기술과 그 응용 분야에 대한 심층적인 이해를 갈망합니다. 더불어, 양자 컴퓨팅의 윤리적, 사회적 함의 및 사회에 미칠 잠재적 영향에 대해서도 깊이 있는 관심을 가지고 있습니다.

backtranslation.backtranslated_en: A tech enthusiast and inquisitive researcher with a strong interest in cutting-edge technology, particularly quantum computing. Fascinated by the revolutionary potential of quantum computing in the fields of computing and data processing, they are eager to gain an in-depth understanding of the technology and its applications. Furthermore, they possess a deep interest in the ethical and societal implications of quantum computing and its potential impact on society.
backtranslation.divergence_explanation: The descriptions are semantically equivalent. The back-translation retains the original's meaning, portraying a technology enthusiast with a strong interest in quantum computing's potential and ethical implications. Any variations in wording do not alter the core message.

persona_en: A database administrator who is responsible for managing and maintaining the database systems, including the understanding and use of database terms and concepts. The person is familiar with the terms used in the text and can interpret and explain them in context, making them useful for other database administrators and users. The person has experience with RAC (replicated across nodes) and knows the differences between logical and physical IO, current gets, and consistent gets. The person is knowledgeable about the database system and can provide insights and solutions related to database performance and optimization.
persona_kr: 데이터베이스 관리자로서, 데이터베이스 용어 및 개념에 대한 이해와 활용을 포함하여 데이터베이스 시스템의 관리 및 유지보수를 담당합니다. 해당 텍스트에 사용된 용어에 익숙하며, 문맥 내에서 이를 해석하고 설명할 수 있어 다른 데이터베이스 관리자 및 사용자에게 유용합니다. RAC(노드 간 복제) 환경에서의 경험이 있으며, 논리적 IO와 물리적 IO, current gets, consistent gets 간의 차이점을 숙지하고 있습니다. 데이터베이스 시스템에 대한 지식이 풍부하며, 데이터베이스 성능 및 최적화와 관련된 통찰력과 솔루션을 제공할 수 있습니다.

backtranslation.backtranslated_en: As a database administrator, I am responsible for the management and maintenance of database systems, including understanding and utilizing database terminology and concepts. I am familiar with the terms used in this text and can interpret and explain them within the context, making it useful for other database administrators and users. I have experience in a RAC (Real Application Clusters) environment and understand the differences between logical IO and physical IO, as well as current gets and consistent gets. I possess extensive knowledge of database systems and can provide insights and solutions related to database performance and optimization.
backtranslation.divergence_explanation: The descriptions are semantically equivalent. The back-translation accurately reflects the original description, preserving the professional role, expertise, and key details related to database administration, RAC experience, and database performance optimization.

persona_en: A technology enthusiast who is fascinated by the advancements in artificial intelligence and its potential applications. This individual is particularly interested in debunking common myths surrounding AI and understanding the true potential of this scientific discipline. They enjoy exploring the works of artists and writers that have depicted hypothetical future technologies and augmented humans, and are curious about how AI can be used to solve complex problems and assist humans in various ways. This person is also aware of the concerns about the potential emergence of super-intelligence and the role of humans in shaping the behavior of AI programs.
persona_kr: 인공지능 기술의 발전과 그 잠재적 응용 분야에 깊은 관심을 가진 기술 애호가. 특히, 인공지능에 대한 흔한 오해를 불식시키고 이 과학 분야의 진정한 잠재력을 이해하는 데 주력한다. 가상 미래 기술과 증강 인간을 묘사한 예술가 및 작가들의 작품을 탐구하는 것을 즐기며, 인공지능이 복잡한 문제를 해결하고 다양한 방식으로 인간을 지원하는 데 어떻게 활용될 수 있는지에 대해 호기심을 느낀다. 또한, 초지능의 잠재적 출현에 대한 우려와 인공지능 프로그램의 행동을 형성하는 데 있어 인간의 역할에 대해서도 인지하고 있다.

backtranslation.backtranslated_en: A technology enthusiast with a deep interest in the advancement of artificial intelligence and its potential applications. They are particularly focused on dispelling common misconceptions about AI and understanding the true potential of this scientific field. They enjoy exploring the works of artists and writers who depict virtual future technologies and augmented humans, and are curious about how AI can be leveraged to solve complex problems and support humans in various ways. They are also aware of concerns regarding the potential emergence of superintelligence and the role of humans in shaping the behavior of AI programs.

persona_en: This text is likely to be of interest to a game developer who is looking to set up the physics, timer, and interactions for a game. The text provides detailed instructions on how to set up the environment for the game, including creating bodies, setting collisions, and creating buttons. The text also mentions the benefits of integrating external code into Kwik, which could be of interest to a developer who is looking to create complex game mechanics. The text is written in a clear and concise style, making it easy for the reader to understand the process of setting up the game.
persona_kr: 본 문서는 게임의 물리 엔진, 타이머, 상호작용 설정을 고려하는 게임 개발자에게 유용할 가능성이 높습니다. 본문은 게임 환경 설정에 대한 상세한 지침을 제공하며, 바디 생성, 충돌 설정, 버튼 생성 등을 포함합니다. 또한, 본문은 Kwik에 외부 코드를 통합하는 것의 이점을 언급하며, 이는 복잡한 게임 메커니즘을 구현하고자 하는 개발자에게 흥미로울 수 있습니다. 본문은 명확하고 간결한 스타일로 작성되어 독자가 게임 설정 과정을 쉽게 이해할 수 있도록 돕습니다.

backtranslation.backtranslated_en: This document is likely useful for game developers who are considering the game's physics engine, timers, and interaction settings. It provides detailed guidance on game environment setup, including body creation, collision settings, and button creation. Furthermore, it mentions the benefits of integrating external code into Kwik, which may be of interest to developers looking to implement complex game mechanics. The document is written in a clear and concise style to help readers easily understand the game setup process.

persona_en: A software developer who specializes in the creation of vector expression templates for OpenCL programming, aiming to reduce the amount of boilerplate code needed for developing OpenCL applications. They are proficient in the use of VexCL library, a modern C++ library for OpenCL development, and have experience with multidevice and multiplatform computations. They are familiar with the differences between NVIDIA's CUDA and OpenCL frameworks in handling compute kernel compilation, and have expertise in the use of VexCL's JIT code generation facility to convert generic C++ code to OpenCL at runtime, thus reducing global memory usage and bandwidth.
persona_kr: OpenCL 프로그래밍을 위한 벡터 표현식 템플릿(vector expression template) 개발을 전문으로 하는 소프트웨어 개발자로서, OpenCL 애플리케이션 개발에 필요한 상용구 코드(boilerplate code)의 양을 줄이는 것을 목표로 한다. OpenCL 개발을 위한 현대적인 C++ 라이브러리인 VexCL 라이브러리 사용에 능숙하며, 멀티 디바이스 및 멀티 플랫폼 연산 경험을 보유하고 있다. NVIDIA의 CUDA 프레임워크와 OpenCL 프레임워크 간의 컴퓨트 커널 컴파일 처리 방식의 차이점을 숙지하고 있으며, VexCL의 JIT 코드 생성 기능을 활용하여 일반적인 C++ 코드를 런타임에 OpenCL 코드로 변환함으로써 전역 메모리 사용량과 대역폭을 줄이는 데 전문성을 가지고 있다.

backtranslation.backtranslated_en: A software developer specializing in the development of vector expression templates for OpenCL programming, aiming to reduce the amount of boilerplate code required for OpenCL application development. Proficient in using the VexCL library, a modern C++ library for OpenCL development, and possesses experience in multi-device and multi-platform computation. Familiar with the differences in compute kernel compilation processing between NVIDIA's CUDA framework and the OpenCL framework. Possesses expertise in leveraging VexCL's JIT code generation capabilities to convert general C++ code into OpenCL code at runtime, thereby reducing global memory usage and bandwidth.
